pageTitle: Men's Pants, Twill Pants and Wool Pants | Free Shipping at L.L.Bean

seoPageInfo.browserTitle: <title>Men's Pants, Twill Pants and Wool Pants | Free Shipping at L.L.Bean</title>
seoPageInfo.metaDescription: <meta name="description" content="Free Shipping at L.L.Bean. Look your best in men's pants from L.L.Bean. Every pair is made with sturdy fabric and fine workmanship, and backed by our 100% satisfaction guarantee." />
seoPageInfo.metaKeywords: <meta name="keywords" content="men's pants, men's pant, men's twill pants, men's wool pants" />

bottomBanners.bannerHtml:
Men's Pants, Twill Pants and Wool Pants from L.L.Bean.

Look your best in Men's pants from L.L.Bean. Our selection includes Men's twill pants, wool pants, easy-care styles and much more, all made from sturdy, comfortable fabrics with fine workmanship. You'll find Men's pants with plenty of options – such as trim Classic Fit, Natural Fit or Relaxed Fit, and Plain or Pleated fronts. We also offer a variety of weights for comfort in every season. Many of our Men's pants resist stains and wrinkles, so it's easy to look smart all day. All L.L.Bean Men's pants come with our legendary 100% satisfaction guarantee, so you can be confident their great looks will last and last.

  • Rugged cotton denim is prewashed for softness
  • Classic Fit is trim with straight legs
